tasklistingByProduct.shortDescription: We need a better, clearer, action-oriented popup for unauthenticated users when they attempt to perform an action that requires authentication

initiative.name: Prepare OU to switch from Trello to OU for managing our product

tasklistingByProduct.shortDescription: User who completes their first task on the product should get a contributor role on that product and be listed in the contributor section of product's 'People' tab

tasklistingByProduct.shortDescription: Contribution Guide is a document which outlines guiding information on how to set up the system for the contributions, what are the guidelines for the delivered works to be approved, where the work needs to be delivered, etc.
tasklistingByProduct.title: Implement "Contribution Guide" capability

tasklistingByProduct.shortDescription: Use a select for product menu on mobile
tasklistingByProduct.title: Mobile friendly product menu

tasklistingByProduct.shortDescription: Product Admin role currently can't e.g. Add Task
tasklistingByProduct.title: Product Admin should include Product Manager Rights

tasklistingByProduct.shortDescription: Create a model that has all the content in a single place for fast loading of listings of Tasks

tasklistingByProduct.title: Use Antd TreeSelect

tasklistingByProduct.shortDescription: In certain cases, when a change is applied, the frontend doesn't show the changes and the user have to refresh the page to see the latest state including changes
tasklistingByProduct.title: Changes to the product data should be immediately reflected

reviewer.firstName: Farbod(Admin of OU & Contributor of AM)

tasklistingByProduct.shortDescription: "Sign In" should not go to switch-test-user in production
tasklistingByProduct.title: "Sign In" should go straight to AM

tasklistingByProduct.title: Rename "Stack" in Tasks to "Skills Required"

tasklistingByProduct.shortDescription: Current performance and SEO not acceptable according to Google Lighthouse
tasklistingByProduct.title: Task Detail page: Improve performance and SEO of page

tasklistingByProduct.shortDescription: When users click on their username in the header, "Your Profile" should the the first item from the drop down which brings the user to the user's profile

tasklistingByProduct.shortDescription: Tasks listed on homepage, clearer UX. Products on second tab.
tasklistingByProduct.title: Implement new homepage design

tasklistingByProduct.shortDescription: Add about page. Create CreateProductRequest model and connect to "Add Product" form in authenticated manner. Remove "Find Talent" and search from top bar.
tasklistingByProduct.title: Important pre-launch hygiene and tweaks

tasklistingByProduct.shortDescription: There needs to be a sign up button as a main call to action in the navbar and the navbar elements should become responsive
tasklistingByProduct.title: Add Sign up to the navbar and improve the responsiveness

tasklistingByProduct.shortDescription: Currently we have "stacks" in several places in data model and "Required Skills" in the UI, we need to be more deliberate
tasklistingByProduct.title: Completely remove "stacks" and add Task Categories and related Expertise

tasklistingByProduct.shortDescription: Contributors should be prompted to provide a delivery message when they submit their work for review. Core teams should be able to read the delivery message while reviewing a submitted work.
tasklistingByProduct.title: Implement Delivery Message capability

tasklistingByProduct.shortDescription: Users should know we are in a "beta" phase
tasklistingByProduct.title: Add Beta "tag" to logo in top middle of screen

tasklistingByProduct.shortDescription: Add cookie popup notification and ensure policies are serving
tasklistingByProduct.title: Cookie popup, privacy-policy.html and terms-of-service.html

tasklistingByProduct.shortDescription: Currently in many places where the user is mentioned (e.g. the assignee field of a task), the profile picture of the user is not shown and instead a default avatar is presented
tasklistingByProduct.title: [Bug] Ensure that the user's profile picture is always shown next to their username

initiative.name: Improve the overall product management experience of OU

tasklistingByProduct.shortDescription: When changing a task status from Claimed to Available, the task should be freed up and the assignee tasks should go away

tasklistingByProduct.shortDescription: Currently there's no way for product teams to allocate points on their tasks and specify whether it's a paid or free task

tasklistingByProduct.shortDescription: Upon clicking on "Add a new guide", an error will be shown "An unexpected error has occurred."
tasklistingByProduct.title: [Bug] Fix the issue related to the Contribution Guide capability in the product setting

tasklistingByProduct.shortDescription: We need to show the allocated amount of points to the task and whether they are liquid points or non-liquid points
tasklistingByProduct.title: Show the points for each task

initiative.name: Improve the overall product management experience of OU
